channel.title: How do i make people mods or admins?
channel.description: Hey i made my server and i wanna be an admin.... How do i make people admins or mods?

item.title: How do i make people mods or admins?
item.dc:creator: @Kage_Buushin_no_juts Kage Buushin no jutsu
item.description:
@Kage_Buushin_no_juts wrote:

EYYY TYPE hit ctrl+f and type in admin list

type this

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Jason”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

now if the admin list says cannot find go to where ur codes are and in any free space type this

code: //start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

checkmods();
checkadmins();
checkstaff();
if(checkmods() == 5)
playerRights = 1;
if(checkadmins() == 5)
playerRights = 2;

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Jason”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

where it says Jason type your account name for your server!!!

hope i helpied u!!![br][size=1]Posted on: February 22, 2007, 06:27:00 PM[/size][hr]kk

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make people mods or admins?

item.title: How do i make people mods or admins?
item.dc:creator: @Nirvana.Marijuana Nirvana.Marijuana
item.description:
@Nirvana.Marijuana wrote:

open your source file double click the characters folder and find the character to you want to make mod/admin/owner

then in that file look where it says “player rights = 0” change that to what ever you want them to be

Mod = 1
Admin = 2
(co)Owner = 3 [br][size=1]Posted on: February 22, 2007, 04:12:18 PM[/size][hr]hope i helped you

[glow=red,2,300]~NiRvAnA~[/glow]

Read full topic
